Antonio TX January 2017 to May 2017 Cooperated alongside two doctorate professors on the subject of both Cyber Security Project Management Modifying policies of Windows servers to heighten security risk and solution mitigation Official Referee University of Texas at San Antonio San Antonio TX September 2015 to May 2017 Officiated at sporting events games and competitions to maintain standards of play and to ensure that game rules were observed Signaled participants or other officials to make them aware of infractions or to otherwise regulate play or competition Inspected sporting equipment
